synopsis.p: Applies a Stanza pipeline on the sections.

description.p: applies a Stanza pipeline on the contents of sections.
By default the pipeline tokenizes and predicts POS-tags. also applies dependency parsing if parse is set, and named entity recognition if ner is set.
The tokenization can be inhibited for using the existing tokens and sentences by setting pretokenized.

param-doc.name: ner
param-doc.p: Either to perform NER. Named entities will be stored in a layer named entities.

param-doc.name: pretokenized
param-doc.p: Either to skip tokenization and use the existing tokens and sentences.
